description: A beautifully crafted amulet with a polished gemstone from the Silverhold mine, surrounded by protective runes.
effect: Grants the wearer a +1 bonus to Constitution saving throws. Once per short rest, the wearer can dispel magical darkness within 30 feet as a reaction (Dormant).
lore: Blessed by the village clerics after the shadows were defeated, this amulet serves as a symbol of protection and resilience.
name: Amulet of Silverhold's Ward

description: A finely crafted silver bracelet that moves like liquid metal, its surface constantly shifting in gentle waves.
effect: Once per long rest, when using Flurry of Blows, push a target 10 feet or gain +2 AC until the start of your next turn.
name: Bracelet of Flowing Silver

description: A pair of black gloves that seem to absorb light.
effect: +1 to Stealth checks. Once per long rest, gain advantage on one Dexterity (Stealth) check (Dormant).
lore: Crafted by cultists, giving the wearer a touch of shadow power.
name: Shadow Walker Gloves

description: A sleek, silver-black dagger with a strange weightlessness, absorbing nearby light.
effect: +1 dagger. Deals +1d6 necrotic to creatures vulnerable to radiant or shadow-based damage. Once per short rest, can cast Shadow Blade for 30 seconds (Dormant).
lore: Forged from metals of the Silverhold Mine, imbued with the energy of the demonâ€™s defeat.
name: Shadowforged Dagger

description: Stamped with the crest of Silverhold.
effect: +1 AC while not using a shield.
name: Silverhold Signet Ring

description: A thin silver band inlaid with tiny crimson dragon scales.
effect: Gain resistance to fire damage for 1 minute, once per long rest. Glows faintly when casting fire spells.
name: Ring of Ember Scales

description: Twisted silver inlaid with moonstones, hums faintly under moonlight.
effect: Once per long rest, regain one expended 1st-level spell slot.
name: Moonstone Armband

description: Polished silver skull on a silver chain. Whispers faintly near corpses and grants insight into undead presences.
effect: Once per long rest, when dealing Sneak Attack damage, add 1d6 necrotic damage. While wearing, the wearer can sense undead within 30 feet.
name: Silverhold Skull Pendant

description: A fang from a great wolf, etched with runes. The wearer bonds with the spirit of the hunt.
effect: Once per long rest, when hitting with a weapon attack, roll damage dice an additional time and add to total.
name: Wolffang Necklace

description: A pendant with a small silver mirror, polished to a high sheen, with faint shadows moving inside.
effect: Once per short rest, gain added blindsight for 5 minutes (Dormant). Shadowy visions may appear but are harmless.
lore: Enchanted with residual energy from the Shadow Demon, hauntingly beautiful.
name: The Silvered Mirror Pendant
